CustomField.description: Defines if the contact is under a customer (customer defined as an account with at least 1 active access code, bill account = true, and status = active)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populated nightly from account level. If the account is a customer, all contacts are customers. (Customer is defined as an account with 1+ active access codes, bill account = true and status = active)
CustomField.label: Is Customer?
